channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows Server

item.title: CVE-2020-1041|2024-08-04T06:25:00.954Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Hyper-V RemoteFX vGPU on a host server fails to properly validate input from an authenticated user on a guest operating system, aka 'Hyper-V RemoteFX vGPU Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1032, CVE-2020-1036, CVE-2020-1040, CVE-2020-1042, CVE-2020-1043.

item.title: CVE-2020-1350|2024-08-04T06:32:01.039Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Windows Domain Name System servers when they fail to properly handle requests, aka 'Windows DNS Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-0637|2024-08-04T06:11:04.594Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Remote Desktop Web Access improperly handles credential information, aka 'Remote Desktop Web Access Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1042|2024-08-04T06:25:00.777Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Hyper-V RemoteFX vGPU on a host server fails to properly validate input from an authenticated user on a guest operating system, aka 'Hyper-V RemoteFX vGPU Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1032, CVE-2020-1036, CVE-2020-1040, CVE-2020-1041, CVE-2020-1043.

item.title: CVE-2020-0610|2024-08-04T06:11:04.613Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Windows Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) when an unauthenticated attacker connects to the target system using RDP and sends specially crafted requests, aka 'Windows Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0609.

item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Hyper-V RemoteFX vGPU on a host server fails to properly validate input from an authenticated user on a guest operating system, aka 'Hyper-V RemoteFX vGPU Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1036, CVE-2020-1040, CVE-2020-1041, CVE-2020-1042, CVE-2020-1043.

This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1032, CVE-2020-1040, CVE-2020-1041, CVE-2020-1042, CVE-2020-1043.

item.title: CVE-2020-0612|2024-08-04T06:11:04.481Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Windows Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) when an attacker connects to the target system using RDP and sends specially crafted requests, aka 'Windows Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-0609|2024-08-04T06:11:04.560Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Windows Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) when an unauthenticated attacker connects to the target system using RDP and sends specially crafted requests, aka 'Windows Remote Desktop Gateway (RD Gateway) Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0610.
